name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - All Low Priority Treatments
title: All low priority treatments
description: Total cost per 1,000 registered patients for all NHS England low priority treatments
why_it_matters: NHS England have recently published a number of areas which should not be routinely prescribed in primary care.
This is the combined cost per 1000 patients for 17 of the 18 measures (excluding herbal medicines).
